scripts.postinstall: run-s install:artists install:genres install:bands install:tracks install:tracks install:users install:favourites install:albums
scripts.run:artists:prod: cd src/modules/artists/servises && npm run build && npm run start:prod
scripts.run:genres:prod: cd src/modules/genres/servises && npm run build && npm run start:prod
scripts.run:bands:prod: cd src/modules/bands/servises && npm run build && npm run start:prod
scripts.run:tracks:prod: cd src/modules/tracks/servises && npm run build && npm run start:prod
scripts.run:users:prod: cd src/modules/users/servises && npm run build && npm run start:prod
scripts.run:favourites:prod: cd src/modules/favourites/servises && npm run build && npm run start:prod
scripts.run:albums:prod: cd src/modules/albums/servises && npm run build && npm run start:prod
scripts.run:all:dev: npm run kill && run-p run:artists:dev run:genres:dev run:bands:dev run:tracks:dev run:users:dev run:favourites:dev run:albums:dev
scripts.run:all: npm run kill && run-p run:artists run:genres run:bands run:tracks run:users run:favourites run:albums
scripts.run:all:prod: npm run kill && run-p run:artists:prod run:genres:prod run:bands:prod run:tracks:prod run:users:prod run:favourites:prod run:albums:prod
